resources.string:
This app does not collect or store any personal
 nor private data by itself.
 
 This app currently stores only in game non-user related status
 (such as highest score) and does not pass it on to any 3rd party service.
 
 This app uses third party libraries, such as
 AndEngine and AndEnginePhysicsBox2DExtension.
 
 The author of this app is not responsible for the behaviour
 of those 3rd party libraries in any way.
 
 The author of this app, Roy Barina, saves himself all the rights
 to change this privacy policy in the future.
